title: Topic 001 Question 177
body: A Security Engineer creates an Amazon S3 bucket policy that denies access to all users. A few days later, the Security Engineer adds an additional statement to the bucket policy to allow read-only access to one other employee. Even after updating the policy, the employee still receives an access denied message.
What is the likely cause of this access denial?
options: The ACL in the bucket needs to be updated
The IAM policy does not allow the user to access the bucket
It takes a few minutes for a bucket policy to take effect
The allow permission is being overridden by the deny
